description: Borrowed from Urdu مارخور‎ (mārxor), from Persian مارخور‎ (mârxor, literally “snake-eater”), from مار‎ (mâr, “snake”) + خور‎ (xor) (present stem of خوردن‎ (xordan, “to eat”)).

entries.meaning: A large wild goat, Capra falconeri, especially Capra falconeri megaceros, syn. Capra megaceros, having huge flattened spiral horns, found in the western Himalayas.
